Question: What is the course plan of ESE 577 at Stony Brook University?
Answer: 08/29 – Introduction to machine learning, regression, regularization 09/05 – Gradient descent 09/12 – Logistic regression 09/19 – Features 09/26 – Neural nets: multilayer perceptrons, backpropagation 10/03 – Convolutional neural nets (CNNs) 10/10 – IN-CLASS MIDTERM 10/17 – Modern neural nets: early stopping, dropout, batch normalization, skip connections 10/24 – Transformers 10/31 – Unsupervised learning 11/07 – Markov decision processes (MDPs) 11/14 – Reinforcement learning 11/21 – Deep reinforcement learning 11/28 – No classes (Thanksgiving break) 12/05 – The future of deep learning.
